item.hephaestusexpansion.katana.descript: The katana is a weapon, duh.. ~~come up with a description~~
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.branding.de: Hitting mobs may make them hotter. Hotter mobs burn with more lively fire.
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.cosmic.desc: Tool mines faster the higher you mine, just don't mine too high
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.magically_m: Mythril's magical properties set the tool off with a bonus upgrade!
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.stellar_swi: Your tool swings and mines really fast!
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.durable.des: Tool is way longer lasting, mines faster and damages more
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.solid.flavo: The more you damage it, the more durable it becomes!
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.solid.descr: Your tool takes less damage every lost durability point
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.prismatic.f: Focus the light, damage the monsters!
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.prismatic.d: Your tool deals more damage when standing in lit areas
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.storm_spell: Striking an opponent may summon thunder upon them
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.freezing.de: Striking an opponent may freeze them in place for a brief amount of time
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.carmot_syne: Holding a tool will regenerate Carmot Shield faster
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.carmot_shie: Provides Carmot Shield to armor which absorbs damage and regenerates over time
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.carmot_boos: Strengthens the Carmot Shield, adding more capacity
recipe.hephaestusexpansion.modifier.carm: Requires the Carmot Shield ability to be added first
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.unobtainabl: Only you are worthy of this tool.
Only the person who forged the tool from this part may hold it
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.soul_powere: Powered by souls of your deceased opponents
Your tool damages more, the more mobs you kill!
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.bang_bang.d: Tool can blast tunnels if Legendary Banglum is applied
modifier.hephaestusexpansion.legendary_b: Increases knockback, gives greater buffs to tools with Banglum parts.
Legends say that this alloy is sharper than diamonds.
material.hephaestusexpansion.aquarium.fl: An aquatic alloy, has strong affinity to water
material.hephaestusexpansion.aquarium.en: Negates the mining penalty when mining underwater, and grants +8 mining speed underwater, or +4 mining speed when in rain per level.
material.hephaestusexpansion.banglum.fla: A very explosive metal! Don't detonate yourself!
material.hephaestusexpansion.banglum.enc: If Legendary Banglum is applied, the tool can blast 3x3x(level*2) tunnels, consuming 2 durability per block.
material.hephaestusexpansion.carmot.flav: Legends say that the Philosopher's Stone was made out of this metal.
material.hephaestusexpansion.carmot.ency: Holding a tool with Carmot Synergy will shorten the shield's maximum cooldown by 1 second per level, and speed up the shield regeneration rate. Binding gives an extra level of Fortune.
material.hephaestusexpansion.celestium.f: A celestial alloy, incredibly sharp and surprisingly lightweight.
material.hephaestusexpansion.celestium.e: Only the person that created the tool can hold it safely - others will take continuous damage holding the tool.
material.hephaestusexpansion.durasteel.e: Grants +12% durability, +4% damage and speed per level
material.hephaestusexpansion.hallowed.fl: A spooky alloy, has strong affinity to souls
material.hephaestusexpansion.hallowed.en:
Killing mobs stores souls inside of the tool.
Increases damage by a half of a natural logarithm of stored souls.
material.hephaestusexpansion.kyber.flavo: A light-focusing material used in lightsabers.
material.hephaestusexpansion.kyber.encyc: Deals up to 15% extra damage per level to mobs in bright places
material.hephaestusexpansion.metallurgiu: The ultimate alloy. Extremely sharp and durable.
Only the person that created the tool can hold it safely - others will take continuous damage holding the tool.
material.hephaestusexpansion.mythril.fla: ... for it was wrought of pure silver to the power and strength of triple steel
material.hephaestusexpansion.mythril.enc: Grants 1 extra upgrade slot per part.
A terrarian metal, known for its incredible durability.

Tool takes up to 50% less damage based on a quite complicated formula.
Lower levels bias the characteristic towards lower durabilities, higher levels towards higher durabilities.
material.hephaestusexpansion.palladium.f: With Palladium tools, you can brand mobs like a cowboy.
material.hephaestusexpansion.palladium.e:
Gives a 15% chance per level of inflicting Heat on target.
Set the entity with Heat ablaze for extra damage!
Despite the name, it's not related to fire.

Gives a 5% chance per level of restoring durability each second.
If this trait repairs the tool 1200 times, the tool gains +1 damage.
A material sourced from asteroids. Has a high affinity to heights.

Grants mining speed at higher heights, +6 per 64 blocks above 64.
Mines slower deep underground.
material.hephaestusexpansion.runite.flav: Not to be confused with Runescape.
material.hephaestusexpansion.runite.ency: Has 10% chance per level to completely immobilize a mob for 5 seconds
material.hephaestusexpansion.stormyx.fla: A magical alloy with magical, thundery abilities.
material.hephaestusexpansion.stormyx.enc:
Gives a 2% chance per level of striking a targeted mob with lightning.
Chance quadrupled in thunderstorms
